tool_description: Calculates optimal routes between origin and destination points using specified routing algorithms and transportation modes.

transport_mode.description: Transportation mode: driving, walking, cycling, transit

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: All latitude values must be between -90 and 90, longitude values between -180 and 180.
Invalid transport mode: Use one of [driving, walking, cycling, transit].
Route not found: No viable route exists between the specified points.
Distance too large: Route distance exceeds maximum allowed for the selected transport mode.
usage: Provide origin and destination coordinates (origin_lat, origin_lon, dest_lat, dest_lon). Optionally specify transport_mode to get mode-specific routing.

route_id.description: Unique identifier for the calculated route

waypoints.description: List of coordinate pairs forming the route path
